description: ff. 302. 265 x 180; 188 x 125 mm. 25 lin. Damascus, Jumādá II, 728, ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Isḥāq ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 458 (10: no. 1); S I, 634. acephalous second half; incip. (as extant): ... عن ابن عباس عن عمر ... قال لما کان ىوم بدرنظر رسول الله
author: Ibn al-Kharrāṭ, ʻAbd al-ḥaqq ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1116 or 17-1185
title: al-Jamʻ bayna al-Ṣaḥīḥayn
creator: Ibn al-Kharrāṭ, ʻAbd al-ḥaqq ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1116 or 17-1185
subject: Muslim ibn al-ḥajjāj al-Qushayrī, ca. 821-875—Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ.
